channel.title: Haunted Hayride on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Elvira and Thirteenth Floor Entertainment Set Los Angeles Haunted Hayride Takeover for Halloween
item.description: The iconic horror host joins forces with the popular L.A. attraction this spooky season, scaring up exclusive merchandise, a thematic maze and more surprises.
